DOC.brief_title: Pain Safety Restylane With Without Lidocaine Correction Moderate Severe Nasolabial Folds
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Men woman age 18 year old Chinese origin Subjects willing abstain facial plastic surgical cosmetic procedure level low orbital rim duration study Intent undergo correction nasolabial fold ( NLF ) wrinkle severity Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale ( WSRS ) either 3 side 4 side Previous use permanent ( nonbiodegradable ) semipermanent facial tissue augmentation therapy autologous fat level lower orbital rim Previous use hyaluronic acid base collagen base biodegradable facial tissue augmentation therapy level lower orbital rim within 12 month treatment Previous tissue revitalisation treatment laser light , mesotherapy radiofrequency , chemical peel dermabrasion midface within 6 month treatment Scars deformity , active skin disease , inflammation related condition near area treat Other condition prevent subject enter study Investigator 's opinion
